Name: Roll Over
Description: Deal 1 damage. If the Bear is awake, deal 1 damage to each enemy instead.

Name: Mark Territory
Description: Move up to two cards from your partner's field to your field.

Name: Settle In
Description: If the Bear is awake, the Bear performs their draw ability.

Name: Roar or Snore
Description:
If the Bear is awake, deal 5 damage and draw two cards.
If the Bear is hibernating, gain 5 vitality and remove 2 time counters.

Name: Poke the Bear
Description:
Deal 5 damage.
If the Bear is hibernating, the Bear performs their draw ability.
